text:
This is slightly inconvenient; the seamcarving notebook for the computational thinking course gives a segmentation fault. I get it consistently when scrubbing the “Seam carving in action” slider back and forth, for a while.
I had it with 1.5.3, and now with 1.5.4 it’s the same. It’s here:
<https://github.com/mitmath/18S191/blob/Spring21/notebooks/week4/seamcarving.jl>

text: Probably not a Pluto problem as such.
